name: Boney's research on Humans! Demo
description:
“Boney’s research on humans” is a stealth top down game set in the universe of “Humans took my neighbors” before the main game in it you’ll guide Boney through 8 levels in the human world as he studies these strange creatures and finds his way home.

This is a smaller project that will further explore the HTMN! Universe and will help me bring more eyes to the franchise experimenting with new gameplay ideas while using some of the assets from HTMN.
